casebody.data:
PAYNE, Director General of Railroads, et al. v. ROSENZWEIG et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 2, 1922.) No. 96. Locke, Babcock, Spratt & Hollister, of Buffalo, N. Y. (Raymond C. Vaughan, of Buffalo, N. Y., of counsel), for plaintiffs in error. Charles P. O’Neil and Edmund J. Stafford, both of Detroit, Mich., for defendants in error.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

In no substantial way is this case different from Davis v. Rosenzweig, 281 Fed. 1020, decided by this court April 4, 1922. Judgment affirmed, with costs.
